section.p: While your men go off to replenish the water supplies and catch a few birds, you stretch out under a shelf of rock. The lulling sound of the waves makes you feel sleepy, but just when you’re on the point of dozing off, a paladin in black and yellow livery appears and greets you in the name of his queen.
You look around for your men. They are not in sight. The paladin asks you to accompany him to see his queen.
